name: Readable Column - Vulkan SDK Documentation
description:
The documentation for the Lunarg Vulkan SDK fills the majority of the browser window horizontally, leading to unreadably wide lines. This style selectively narrows paragraphs, list items and table cells to make sure they are closer to the ideal width for the human eye to scan.

If you are interested in Vulkan, be sure to come and check out my pages on it: http://ahcox.com/vulkan/
